section.title: Operations by Work Center
section.para: To view a list of operations performed at a work center, select the "Operations by Work Center" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying operations by work center, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify work center whose operations you want to display.
The site code for the site where the work center is located will display once a work center has been selected.
Display lists all operations by work center, using the specified parameters.
